data.name: One Btn Bosses
data.detailed_description:
One Btn Bosses is a no-questions-asked, mechanically complex Boss Rush controlled with just a single button!

ðŸš€ Your ship will orbit the Boss automatically, and pressing your button will activate an Evasive Maneuver - which can be as simple as changing direction, or as complex as creating a clone that you can teleport to at any time! These will be key to avoiding the Boss's onslaught of deadly attacks.

ðŸ”¥ ...But it's not all about dodging. The longer you orbit without using your Maneuver, the faster your Cannon will fire, and the quicker the Boss will go down. Move Fast, Shoot Fast!

ðŸ›¸ Customize Your Ship! Trick out your Cannon to fire a constant stream of bullets, a powerful burst, or a massive, manually-reloaded one-hit-wonder! Mix and match different combinations of Cannon and Maneuver modules to find your favorite build!

ðŸ“ˆ Insane Difficulty!! With over 16 levels, unlockable modules, Daily Challenges and Leaderboards, you'd better be ready for a fight!

One Btn Bosses is a no-questions-asked, mechanically complex Boss Rush controlled with just a single button!

ðŸš€ Your ship will orbit the Boss automatically, and pressing your button will activate an Evasive Maneuver - which can be as simple as changing direction, or as complex as creating a clone that you can teleport to at any time! These will be key to avoiding the Boss's onslaught of deadly attacks.

data.short_description: It's in the name. You have one button. There's bosses. You fight them. Yes, only with one button.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or SteamDeck
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
